clinical_study.brief_title: AlloSure Guided Immuno-Optimization for COVID-19: An Early Experience
clinical_study.official_title: AlloSure Guided Immuno-Optimization for COVID-19: An Early Experience

brief_summary.textblock:
The utilization of AlloSure to help guide immunosuppression management in solid organ
      transplant recipients diagnosed with COVID-19

detailed_description.textblock:
An observational case series of patients with solid organ transplants who have been admitted
      with suspected COVID-19 utilizing AlloSure dd-cf DNA to help guide immunosuppression
      management balancing the treatment of sepsis and avoiding allograft rejection.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessing the utility of AlloSure dd-cfDNA to guide clinical immune-optimization for transplant patients with COVID-19

study_pop.textblock:
Solid organ (liver, heart, lung or kidney) transplant recipients diagnosed with suspected
        or confirmed case of COVID-19

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Liver, Heart, Lung or Kidney organ transplant recipient with a suspected or confirmed
             diagnosis of COVID-19
